title: Home
content: .lab-header-name{ display: inline-block; } .lab-header-name h4{ font-size: 16px; } .lab-header-status{ float:right } .lab-header-status-text{ font-variant: small-caps; } .lab-expected-supplement-settings{ margin-bottom: 10px; border-top: 1px solid #ddd; padding-top: 5px; } .speech-bubble { margin-left: 20px; background: azure; position: relative; padding: 4px 8px; margin: 4px 0px; border-radius: 10px; color:black; display:inline-block } .speech-bubble.warning { background: lightgoldenrodyellow; } .speech-bubble.left-arrow::after { left: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-right-color: azure; border-left: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-left: -6px; } .speech-bubble.right-arrow::after { right: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-left-color: azure; border-right: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-right: -6px; } .lab-message-sender{ font-style: italic; color:grey; } .lab-open{ } .lab-open-status{ font-variant: small-caps; display: inline-block; position: relative; } .lab-open-status-icon{ display: inline-block; width: 22px; position: absolute; top: -1px; } .lab-open-status-text{ padding-left: 26px; } .lab-button{ margin: 4px 0; display: inline-block; } .lab-button-text{ display: inline-block; } .lab-separator{ display: inline-block; width: 1px; height: 16px; margin-bottom: -4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; } .lab-arrow{ border: solid #FFF; border-width: 0 1px 1px 0; display: inline-block; padding: 4px; margin-bottom: 2px; border-radius: 1px; transform: rotate(45deg) translateY(2px); -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg); } 1. Gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande Svara gällande komplettering ❗ + Lägg till handling Sökande vill komplettera Jag går på gymnasiet och skickar in mina betyg så snart jag får dem. Bevilja eller avslå Komplettering stängd 1. title: Home
content: .lab-header-name{ display: inline-block; } .lab-header-name h4{ font-size: 16px; } .lab-header-status{ float:right } .lab-header-status-text{ font-variant: small-caps; } .lab-expected-supplement-settings{ margin-bottom: 5px; /* border-top: 1px solid #ddd; */ /* padding-top: 5px; */ } .speech-bubble { margin-left: 20px; background: #f7fbff; position: relative; padding: 4px 8px; margin: 4px 0px; /* border-radius: 10px; */ color:#00518f; display:inline-block; border: 1px solid #f7fbff; } .speech-bubble:hover { border: 1px solid #0077cc; } .speech-bubble.warning { background: #fffbf2; border: 1px solid #fffbf2; color: #cc9600 } .speech-bubble.inactive { color: gray; } .speech-bubble.left-arrow::after { left: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-right-color: azure; border-left: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-left: -6px; } .speech-bubble.right-arrow::after { right: 0; top: 50%; content: ''; position: absolute; border: 6px solid transparent; border-left-color: azure; border-right: 0; margin-top: -6px; margin-right: -6px; } .lab-message-sender{ font-style: italic; color:grey; } .lab-open{ } .lab-open-status{ font-variant: small-caps; display: inline-block; position: relative; } .lab-open-status-icon{ display: inline-block; width: 22px; position: absolute; top: -1px; } .lab-open-status-text{ padding-left: 26px; } .lab-button{ margin: 4px 0; display: inline-block; } .lab-button.hidden{ visibility: hidden; display: none; } .lab-button-text{ display: inline-block; } .lab-separator{ display: inline-block; width: 1px; height: 16px; margin-bottom: -4px; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; } .lab-arrow{ border: solid #FFF; border-width: 0 1px 1px 0; display: inline-block; padding: 4px; margin-bottom: 2px; border-radius: 1px; transform: rotate(45deg) translateY(2px); -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg); } .rolldown-button{ border-top: solid #FFF 1px; padding-top: 4px; margin-top: 6px; display: none; } /* The Modal (background) */ .modal { display: none; /* Hidden by default */ position: fixed; /* Stay in place */ z-index: 1; /* Sit on top */ padding-top: 100px; /* Location of the box */ left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; /* Full width */ height: 100%; /* Full height */ overflow: auto; /* Enable scroll if needed */ background-color: rgb(0,0,0); /* Fallback color */ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* Black w/ opacity */ } /* Modal Content */ .modal-content { background-color: #fefefe; margin: auto; padding: 20px; border: 1px solid #888; width: 420px; } /* The Close Button */ .close { color: #aaaaaa; float: right; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; } .close:hover, .close:focus { color: #000; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; } 1. Sista kompletteringsdag: Spara // Get the modal var modal = document.getElementById("editModal"); // Get the button that opens the modal var btn = document.getElementById("editBtn"); // Get the element that closes the modal var span = document.getElementsByClassName("close")[0]; // When the user clicks the button, open the modal btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "block"; } // When the user clicks on (x), close the modal span.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = "none"; } // When the user clicks anywhere outside of the modal, close it window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = "none"; } } //Show and hide rolldown button document.getElementById("clickToRolldownBtn").onclick = function() { var rolldownBtn = document.getElementById("rolldownBtn"); if (rolldownBtn.style.display === "none") { rolldownBtn.style.display = "block"; } else { rolldownBtn.style.display = "none"; } }
